method_deprecated: This method has been deprecated in favor of circuit.cgi?method=remove.

circuit_id.name: circuit_id
circuit_id.description: The id of the circuit to be removed.
circuit_id.validation_error_text: Parameter circuit_id only accepts integer numbers.

workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup ID that the circuit belongs to.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

type.name: type
type.description: The id of the circuit to be removed.
type.validation_error_text: CGI input parameter type does not match pattern /^(openflow|mpls)$/

remove_time.name: remove_time
remove_time.description: The time for the circuit to be removed in epoch time. ---1 means now.
remove_time.validation_error_text: Parameter remove_time only accepts integer numbers.

force.name: force
force.description: Clear the database regardless of whether fwdctl reported success or not.
force.validation_error_text: Parameter force only accepts either 0 or 1 for false or true values, respectively.

name: remove_circuit
description: Removes a circuit from the network, and returns success if the circuit has been removed successfully or scheduled for removal from the network.
